name: I'll be back
description:
You have woken up in an unknown place and you have to find out what happened to you.The game is a horror - oriented story.  Examine each room carefully and try not to run

 Leave your comments , they are important to me.

W - forward  

S-back  

 A-strafe left  

 D-strafe right 

 C-crouch  

Shift -run   

Enter - use   

F- flashlight  

Right Click- interaction 

UPDATE: Voice acting
